title: NO decision to impose curfew on 3rd April
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); No decision has yet been taken to impose curfew on the 3rd of April, DIG Ajith Rohana states.
Speaking at the press conference speaking to reporters at the Department of Government Information on the Mirihana Protests said that it has not been decided to impose curfew as of yet on the date.
Police imposed curfew last night (31) after protests erupted in Pengiriwatte, and were lifted today at 5 AM.
Carpenters protest on Galle Road; Heavy police presence in the area
